io.fluo.api.client

Interface FluoAdmin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FluoAdminImpl

    public interface FluoAdmin
extends AutoCloseable
    Provides methods for initializing and administering a Fluo application.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  FluoAdmin.AlreadyInitializedException
      Exception that is thrown if Fluo application was already initialized.
      static class  FluoAdmin.InitOpts
      Specifies Fluo initialization options such as clearing Zookeeper or existing Accumulo table.
      static class  FluoAdmin.TableExistsException
      Exception that is thrown if Accumulo table (set by io.fluo.admin.accumulo.table) exists during initialization.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close() 
      void initialize(FluoAdmin.InitOpts opts)
      Initializes Fluo application and stores shared configuration in Zookeeper.
      void updateSharedConfig()
      Updates shared configuration in Zookeeper.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(FluoAdmin.InitOpts opts)
                throws FluoAdmin.AlreadyInitializedException,
                       FluoAdmin.TableExistsException
        Initializes Fluo application and stores shared configuration in Zookeeper. Shared configuration consists of properties with "io.fluo.app", "io.fluo.observer." and "io.fluo.tx" prefixes. Throws FluoAdmin.AlreadyInitializedException if Fluo application was already initialized in Zookeeper. If you want to initialize Zookeeper again, set FluoAdmin.InitOpts.setClearZookeeper(boolean) to true. Throws FluoAdmin.TableExistsException if Accumulo table exists. If you want to clear table, set FluoAdmin.InitOpts.setClearTable(boolean) to true.
        Throws:
        FluoAdmin.AlreadyInitializedException
        FluoAdmin.TableExistsException

      • updateSharedConfig

        void updateSharedConfig()
        Updates shared configuration in Zookeeper. Shared configuration consists of properties with "io.fluo.app", "io.fluo.observer." and "io.fluo.tx" prefixes. This method is called if a user has previously called #initialize() but wants changes to shared configuration updated in Zookeeper.

        During this method Observers are reinitialized using configuration passed to FluoAdmin and not existing shared configuration stored in zookeeper. So make sure all config needed by observers is present.

      • close

        void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
